sense.def:
A debate
je pogovor, v katerem ljudje izražajo različna mnenja o neki témi.

seg.quote: There was a great deal of debate about the national health service.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
debate something
, precej uradno razpravljajo o nečem, tako da predstavljajo različna mnenja.

seg.quote: These issues have been widely debated.
They debated the motion that capital punishment should be re-introduced.

sense.def:
To debate what to do
pomeni razmišljati o možnem ukrepanju, preden se odločimo, kaj bomo storili.

seg.quote: He turned round, debating whether to go back.

sense.def:
Kar je
open to debate
, še ni dokazano, da je resnično.
